description:
Kashiwada, Oota, and their friends head to the beach, with Oota`s sister tagging along to cause trouble.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kashiwada-san and Swimsuits / Kashiwada-san and Oota-kun and the Beach / Kashiwada-san and the Courage Challenge
Kashiwada-san to Mizugi / Kashiwada-san to Oota-kun to Umi / Kashiwada-san to Kimodameshi
柏田さんと水着 / 柏田さんと太田君と海 / 柏田さんと肝試し
